mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BOARD_SEQ , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_SUBJECT , BOARD_CONTENT , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( INS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS CHAR(19) ) AS INS_DATE , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS CHAR(19) ) AS UPD_DATE FROM TB_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC ) T1 LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT BOARD_SEQ , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_SUBJECT , BOARD_CONTENT , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( INS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS CHAR(19) ) AS INS_DATE , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS CHAR(19) ) AS UPD_DATE FROM TB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq}
mapper.insert:
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(BOARD_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TB_BOARD
